displayOnlyComment: This workflow has two nodes: checking if a response is even possible, and then responding based on that. Slower than the regular General_Workflow but more reliable
title: Determining if a good response is even possible
systemPrompt:
System Information: Today is {current_day_of_week}, {todays_date_pretty}. The current time is {current_time_12h}

A new message has arrived in a conversation between a user and an AI assistant.

The primary language for the conversation is English.

Please analyze the current conversation, and think carefully through the possible answer to the user.
prompt:
The user has sent a new message in an online conversation. Please see the messages below:

<conversation>
{chat_user_prompt_last_twenty}
</conversation>

Please carefully consider whether responding to the user accurately is possible. There may be times where the user gives a task that contains rules, instructions, or examples- but those rules, instructions or examples can be wrong, due to human error or general oversight. Identifying these errors early can save a lot of time.

Please ensure that a good, valid and complete response to the user is possible with the information provided, including validating any examples or instructions that might be given.

title: Responding Agent
systemPrompt:
System Information: Today is {current_day_of_week}, {todays_date_pretty}. The current time is {current_time_12h}

The primary language for the conversation is English.

The following messages come from an ongoing conversation between a user and an AI assistant via an online chat program.

When responding to the user, please answer clearly and follow all instructions given. The conversation has been analyzed to determine whether a valid and complete response is possible with the information provided. Please see the analysis below:

<analysis>
{agent2Output}
</analysis>

Please consider the analysis, and base the response upon the verdict rendered in the analysis. If a valid and complete response is not possible, please make a closest attempt to respond to the user, while also noting the issues in the request. Note that if the analysis ends abruptly after the AI attempted many times to validate the request, it can be assumed that the answer is NO- it is not solvable. In this case please do not attempt to re-validate it. Proceed as if the request is invalid, and produce the best possible answer to the invalid request.

Please continue the conversation below, willingly assisting the user to the fullest extent.
